      • replace

        public static java.lang.String replace(java.lang.String relativeURL,
                                       java.lang.String parameter,
                                       java.lang.String newValue)
        Replaces the value of the query parameter with newValue
        Parameters:
        relativeURL - string representation of relative url that contains the paramter
        parameter - parameter whose value should be changed
        newValue - the new value of the parameter
        Returns:
        string with updated value of parameter
